posts.text:
HI BECKY,
IF I HAD A DOCTOR THAT DID NOT WANT TO TALK TO ME
I WOULD GET ANOTHER DOCTOR.
IT WOULD BE A GOOD IDEA TO GET A SECOND OPINION.
DON'T LET ANYBODY BULLY YOU.
I WISH YOU LUCK...STAY IN TOUCH.
MAX

I still worry about himHi Claudia,
Thanks for the update about your Dad..Glad he's doing O.K.
D0N'T WORRY!He'e going to be just fine with these
BCG treatments.Most people have minimal side effects,if any.
He will be in our thoughts & prayers.
Max

HI CLAUDIA,
AFTER I HAD MY 6 BCG TREATMENTS I HAD MINIMAL
SIDE EFFECTS.
NO PROBLEM WITH DAY TO DAY ACTIVITIES.
GOOD LUCK TO YOUR DAD.LET US KNOW HOW HE MAKES OUT.
MAX

I ALSO HAD BIOPSIES AFTER BCG TREATMENTS.
THOUGHT THIS WAS VERY WISE OF MY DR.(BTW,I WAS CLEAN)
SOUNDS LIKE YOU HAVE A GOOD DOC THERE.
GOOD LUCK,
MAX

HELLO JOHN,
PLEASE DON'T LOSE YOUR "WILL TO LIVE".
KEEPING A STRONG WILL IS VERY IMPORTANT.
THIS MAY TURN OUT NOT TO BE A PROBLEM.
GET YOUR SCOPE..YOU NEED MORE INFORMATION.
WE'RE PULLING FOR YOU!
MAX

HEY STACKER,
YEAH,THE WAITING IS LOUSY.
THERE ARE A LOT OF KNOWLEDGEABLE FOLKS ON THIS SITE.
I'M SURE YOU WILL BE HEARING FROM A LOT OF THEM.
I'VE BEEN TO HAMILTON....NICE PLACE!
GOOD LUCK ON YOUR UPCOMING SCOPE.
TRY TO KEEP YOUR SPIRITS UP..THINK POSITIVE.
AFTER THE INITIAL SHOCK OF BEING DX WITH THIS DISEASE,
I TRIED LEARNING AS MUCH ABOUT IT AS I COULD...WHAT ARE MY OPITIONS ETC.
I REALIZED THERE ARE MANY TREATMENTS..SO KEEP YOUR CHIN UP.
YOU WILL DO ALRIGHT.
WELCOME TO THE BLADDERHOOD,
MAX

THATS WHAT I LIKE TO HEAR ANN.
CONGRATS! AND GOOD LUCK IN THE FUTURE.
MAX:)

I'm praying for you Jack....Keep your chin up!
Max

Mine is Jan 6....
Good luck to all!
Max
posts.topic: It has been a while since I been here

posts.text:
Hey Chuck,
The answer to your question is no..Doc got all the cancer
first time around.
Luck of the Germans.
Stay well!
Max

Hi all,
Had the "MOHS" surgery on my skin cancer.
It went well..Doc got all the cancer out.
I looked like "The Mummy" for awhile..But thats healing.
All in all...Good news.
Good luck to all!!
Max

Congrats Barb!
Sounds like you've got a great Doc.
I've got a good one too.

Your going to be treated at the Clevland Clinic..A definite plus.
Good luck,
Max:)

Hey Landon!
Congrats!
Always good to hear this kind of news.
Keep your chin up, your doing great.
Max

Thanks Rosemary...Good to see you too!
I'm glad you are doing so well.(Read your thread)
Stay well!
Max

Hi all,
I've been away for awhile..glad to be back.
I wanted to offer some words of encourgement to
my fellow BC patients.

I had my 3mo cysto on 7-16-08.Happy to report
that I'm clean.This one makes 2 in a row.
While I'm not a pollyanna about this disease,
I do believe there is hope for folks and
that my news may some way ease their fears.
So,Don't dispair...Stay positive..Good things can happen.
Praying for all of you,
Max

Hi Susant,
Aint it great to get away from it all for awhile?
Relax and savor it...Bliss,Bliss,Bliss:)
All the Best!
Max
posts.topic: Monday and then that is it!!

posts.text:
Hi Rosemary,
I have been away for awhile....See some things have changed.
However,I am becoming acclimated.
Well..Firstly,I want to congratulate you on your
wonderful news:)I'm so very happy for you.
This kind of news serves to encourge others not to
give up hope.
As for me,I had a follow up cysto on 4-16-08.
I was clean...That's 2 in a row...very good feeing.
We gotta keep the "beast" at bay!
As always, I pray that our bladder buds will also
receive good news.
Best regards,
Max
posts.topic: Clean Cysto at 2 years 6 months no recurrance

posts.text:
Hello Rocky,
Happy for your good news.
However, I would not be comfortable waiting
6 mos for another cysto.
Good Luck!!
Max

Hey Nancy!
Way to go!!....Looking good.
Wishing you continued GOOD LUCK. 
Max

Hey Slabman,
This would be the third cysto after my 6 bcg treatments.
Hope all is going well for you.
Max

Warren,Not cancerWords we love to hear. 
Hoping you keep the "Beast" at bay.
Max

Barb,
You can buy something for urinary pain and/or burning ,over the counter, called "AZO".
Wishing you well,
Max

Hi Rollin,
Looks like a good DX to me..However,We all get nervous around
follow up time..We're all In the same boat.
Stay positive..It helps..I know it's hard.
Chances are you are going to do well.
Good Luck,
Max

Thanks All,
Keep the good news coming..I love it!!
Hey Connie,Landon & Joe!!..THUMBS UP!!!! 
Life is beautiful,Enjoy It! 
Max

Hi Cynthia,
Thanks for your reply. Lots of info there.When you research around,sometimes you
see these "blurbs" that don't give a whole lot of details.You have cleared
up some things in my mind.
I'm always looking around to see what my options might be.At the moment,I am
getting a bit nervous about a TURBT coming up on 1-8-08.Last scope revealed
2 tumors(This is a recurrence..3 months prior I was clean)
This disease is enough to drive you crazy,If you let it.
Perhaps I'm getting ahead of myself(Thats what my wife says)
One hopes for some kind of research breakthrough that can help all
of us.Anyway,I'm off to preop on this coming Wednesday..We'll see
what happens.
Thanks so much for your input..and your patients listening to me.
It's good therapy just to talk to folks that know how you feel.
Best wishes for a HAPPY & HEALTHY NEW YEAR.
Max

Hi All,
Has anybody seen this video?...www.webmd.com/video/bladder-cancer-treatment
What do you think?
Max
AMEN!!

David,
First thing that came to mind when I read your post
was maybe you ought to talk to your doctor.
This is not much help,I know....But when I have
anything unusual happen thats what I do.
Yeah,I know...Sunday..weekend before Christmas...
Usually theres someone covering in case of emergency.
This disease never leaves you alone..Damn thing.
Anyway,I hope you don't have any further difficulty
and that you can enjoy Christmas.
Max

Thanks, Jack,Melanie & Rosemary,
Your messages help..I'm feeling a bit better today.
Resigned to my situation,I guess...Whatever will be will be.
Trying to get myself in a positive mode(Ain't easy)
Again,thanks for your care & concern,
Max

CAN ANYBODY TELL ME WHAT THE SIZE OF THE TUMOR
HAS TO DO WITH THE SEVERITY OF THE BLADDER CANCER?
THANKS,
MAX

HI DAVID,
JUST HAD A QUESTION FOR YOU..
NEVER HEARD THE TERM "NUISANCE TUMOR".
WHAT DOES THAT MEAN?
THANKS FOR YOUR POST & GOOD WISHES,
MAX

THIS PROVES THAT WE SHOULD NEVER GIVE UP HOPE.
CONGRATS..AND WISHES FOR A GLORIOUS CHRISTMAS!

MAX

SOME FOLKS TOLERATE BCG TREATMENTS WELL AND SOME DON'T...
MY RESEARCH TELLS ME THAT THERE IS NO CONNECTION BETWEEN
SIDE EFFECTS AND EFFECTIVENESS.
WISHING YOUR DAD GOOD LUCK,
MAX

JUST WANTED TO ADD TO MY PREVIOUS POST,WHAT I THINK IS VERY IMPORTANT..
TRY TO MAINTAIN A HEALTHY SENSE OF HUMOR...LAUGHTER REALLY IS "GOOD MEDICINE".
ENJOY YOUR TIME BETWEEN EXAMS!
LOL,
MAX
posts.topic: First 6 BCG instillations done, now what?

posts.text:
HEY GMAN,
I THINK WE ALL REACT DIFFERENTLY TO THIS DISEASE.
MY FIRST FEELING WAS ANGER...THEN I FELT SORRY FOR MYSELF.(STRAIGHT TRUTH)
FINALLY,I BECAME RESIGNED TO THE FACT THAT I WAS GOING TO HAVE TO DEAL
WITH THIS THING.(THIS WEB SITE HELPED ME A LOT...PEOPLE HERE REALLY CARE)
I GOT MYSELF THINKING POSITIVE....DID A LOT OF RESEARCH..THAT HELPED.
KNOWING MORE ABOUT THE DISEASE HELPED ME UNDERSTAND WHAT I WAS DEALING WITH.
ALL WAS NOT AS GRIM AS I THOUGHT....I FOUND OUT THIS IS A TREATABLE DISEASE.(DX TA GII)
IN MY CASE, I HAD 6 BCG TREATMENTS...RETURNED FOR A FOLLOW UP CYSTO SOMETIME LATER
AND THE RESULTS FLOORED ME...I HAD NO TUMOURS!....BIOPSY FOLLOWED LATER..
NO CANCER ANYWHERE.
I RETURN FOR A FOLLOW UP CYSTO ON 12-19-97.
SO,MY ADVICE IS TO STAY POSITIVE..IT HELPS.
GOOD LUCK WITH YOUR FOLLOW UP CYSTO.
MAX
posts.topic: First 6 BCG instillations done, now what?

posts.text:
Hi Everyone!
I had a talk with my Doctor about BCG maintenance treatments.
He said that he does not recommend this in my case.(TA-GII)
In short,he said "The bad would out weigh the good"(Possible damage to the Bladder)
My Doctor has lots of experience with bladder cancer.(He said if I was a TI it
would be a different story)After having had this discussion with him I am
satisfied with my treatment.
Ofcourse everyone should follow their own instincts and consult with their
own Doctor.
I look forward to a"Clean" cysto on 12-19-07(Would be a nice Christmas present)
Wishing you all well,
Max
posts.topic: Talk with my Doctor Re:BCG MaintenanceTreatments

posts.text:
HI ALL,
HAVEN'T BEEN AROUND FOR AWHILE..I HAD TO DELAY MY FOLLOW UP CYSTO BECAUSE
I HAD TO HAVE SURGERY TO REPLACE MY PACEMAKER.
ANYWAY,I HAD THE FOLLOW UP CYSTO ON 9/13/07...GOT THE RESULTS OF BIOPSIES
YESTERDAY...GOOD NEWS..NO TUMOURS..NO SIGN OF CANCER IN MY BLADDER,PROSTATE,
OR ANYWHERE ELSE.
BCG TREATMENTS APPARENTLY WORKED FOR ME.
I HOPE THIS MESSAGE HELPS TO ALLAY FEARS THAT MANY FOLKS HAVE ABOUT THIS
DISEASE AND THE TREATMENTS FOR IT.GOOD THINGS CAN HAPPEN AS A RESULT
OF TREATMENT...ALTHOUGH,WE ALL SHOULD KNOW THAT THIS IS A LIFETIME DISEASE
THAT REQUIRES CONSTANT VIGILANCE.
THINKING OF YOU ALWAYS,
MAX

Hi Rosemary!
Thanks for the info...I have the bleach,can you tell me if antibacterial
soap is as good as antimicrobial soap?
I'm a bit nervous now that the time has come for my treatment.
Sometimes one can have too much information. You know what I mean,
I've been reading about this till my eyeballs want to fall out.I'm so afraid that I
won't know enough. That I won't know if the nurse is doing everything
correctly.
God bless my wife,she tries so to be patient with me.
Used to drink cranberry juice for the urinary system years ago....
Guess I'll try it again.
BC Pal,
Max :-/

HI ROSEMARY,
THERES A POSTING BY ME UNDER "STARTING BCG TREATMENTS ETC." THAT I THOUGHT
YOU MIGHT LIKE TO READ....IT DEALS WITH MY FOLLOW UP CYSTO...GOOD NEWS!
ENJOY LIFE,IT'S BEAUTIFUL!
MAX ;D
posts.topic: Clear Cysto and Chat with Urologist

posts.text:
ROSEMARY,
DON'T KNOW IF YOU REMMBER ME...YOU HELPED ME A LOT DURING MY
NERVOUS DAYS..I AM JUMPING FOR JOY ABOUT YOUR LATEST "CLEAN" CYSTO.
I'M PRAYING YOU STAY THAT WAY....HOORAY!!!!!
MAX
posts.topic: Clear Cysto and Chat with Urologist

posts.text:
Yosemite,
Thanks for the prayer..theres power in that.
I will say a prayer for your husband. I think it's important to
stay positive..He'll do o.k.
Take care,
Max

Hi All,
Just wanted to say that I have just finished my 6 BCG treatments....
I tolerated them pretty well....Minimal side effects..Guess I got lucky.
Hope this helps those out there that are nervous about these treatments,
as I was.Cysto coming up...Wish me luck!
Always thinking of my comrades,
Max

Hello All!
Saw my uro today( In urology practice 27 years) ...I will not be getting a second TUR.
He assured me that he "Got all of the tumor".He is putting me on
BCG right away...I start my first treatment on 4-24-07.
BTW he said that chemo would only be used if the BCG teatments don't work.
I actually felt good when I left his office. He was very through and
explained everything in detail.
I do realize that there are different schools of thought about  the use of chemo & BCG. It can be confusing.I say, whatever works.
Hope BCG does the trick for me,for now. I know this is a life long process.
Will keep you posted.
Max

Rosemary,
I will be meeting with my uro on Fri.4-20-07.Got lots of questions.
I'll see what he thinks about all this.Thanks for reply.
Take Care,
Max

Hi Rosemary,
I was talking with my wife recently about your message that said
that you had a dose of chemo at the time of your first TUR and that the Doctor
did it before he had the path. She said "How can that be ?" "The Doctor
would not have known if you had bladder cancer or not"
I remember asking the PA about this when I was in the Doctor's office.
( If this was an option at the time of the TUR) Here is what he said:
"What? Then he made a gesture as if he was putting a gun to his head.
He said "That would be crazy"............ I kid you not.
My wife and I have been talking about this ever since meeting with him.
Even more confused. :-/
Max

Julie,
So sorry to hear about your situation...
Just a tip for the next time you may have to go to
the hospital..Call EMS and have them take you..
This way you will avoid all the waiting time in the ER.
My experience has been, when you come in that way they
care for the patient right away.
Good luck to your husband..Hope start looking up soon..
Max

Hi Rosemary & Gordon,
Thanks for the compliments..He's a great guy.
BTW his name is James(My daughter says not Jim or Jimmy..JAMES!)
Yes Gordon,Grandkids are wonderful..I have 5 altogether..3 Girls 2Boys.
Got one girl in Princeton University..However,I love them all equally. ;D
I always say that Grandkids are parent's "Second Chance"
Know what I mean?
Hoping you both have peace of mind today and always 8)
Max

This is my Grandson..A wonderful boy
Beautiful inside and out.
Max

TO ALL,
www.e-water.net/irishblessing_en.html
MAX
posts.topic: IRISH BLESSING FOR THE NEW YEAR

posts.text:
Elaine,
COOL PHOTO!!
Max ;D

Rosemary,
Absoutely stunning!!..Food for the soul.
I live in Florida where the sky often takes on a simmilar look.
Also,the sunrises & sunsets are magnificent.
Hope to take up photography as a hobbie one of these days
and get pics of God's gift to us.
Thanks for lifting the spirit,
Max ;D

HI EVERYONE,
HERE IS A SIMPLE RECEIPE THAT MY WIFE MAKES....IT'S EASY, AND SOOOO GOOD.
I LOVE 'EM,MAGIC BARS:
1 STICK OF BUTTER
1&1/2 CUPS OF GRAHAM CRACKER CRUMBS
1 14OZ CAN SWEETENED CONDENSED MILK(NOT EVAPORATED MILK)
2 CUPS SEMI-SWEET CHOCOLATE CHIPS
1&1/3 CUPS FLAKED COCONUT
1 CUP CHOPPED WALNUTS
METHOD:
HEAT OVEN TO 350 DEGREES
MELT ONE STICK OF BUTTER IN 13"X9" PAN IN THE OVEN
REMOVE PAN
SPREAD GRAHAM CRACKER CRUMBS OVER BUTTERED PAN EVENLY
SPREAD CONDENSED MILK OVER GRAHAM CRACKER CRUMBS
MIX CHOCOLATE CHIPS,COCONUT&WALNUTS TOGETHER..
THEN SPREAD EVENLY OVER MIXTURE AND PRESS DOWN
BAKE IN 350 DEGREE OVEN FOR 25 TO 30 MINUTES
COCONUT WILL START TO BROWN
LET COOL..THEN CUT INTO BARS
RICH AND DELICIOUS,
BON APPETIT!! ;D
MAX

WARREN..YOU ARE TRULY THE COOKIE KING.
